casebody.data:
In the MATTER OF James David LLOYD, an Attorney at Law (Attorney No. 043901996) M-1501 September Term 2017
081519 Supreme Court of New Jersey. July 30, 2018

ORDER

This matter having been duly presented on the motion for reinstatement to practice filed by JAMES DAVID LLOYD of MIDLAND PARK, who was admitted to the bar of this State in 1996, and who has been temporarily suspended from the practice of law since March 23, 2016;

And the Disciplinary Review Board having reported to the Court that respondent has paid the outstanding administrative costs owed;

And good cause appearing;

It is ORDERED that the motion is granted, and JAMES DAVID LLOYD is reinstated to the practice of law, effective immediately.
